column2: geom_linerange(aes(ymax = RecordHigh , ymin = RecordLow) ,color='#ecebe3') + geom_linerange(aes(ymax = NormalHigh , ymin = NormalLow) ,color='#C8B8BA') + geom_linerange(aes(ymax = High , ymin = Low) ,color='#A90248') +
xlab("    Jan     Feb    Mar     Apr       May      Jun     Jul      Aug     Sept      Oct      Nov     Dec ")
